skrull.game.model
Interface IPlayer

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface IPlayer
extends java.io.Serializable

Represents a single player. Players are identified by a randomly generated UUID.

Author:
jesse

Method Summary
 java.util.UUID getPlayerId()
          unique identifier for this player / client.
 java.lang.String getPlayerToken()
          Token identifier (eg "X","O") for the player in the current game.
 void setPlayerToken(java.lang.String c)
          Used to update the player token
 

Method Detail

getPlayerId

java.util.UUID getPlayerId()
unique identifier for this player / client. This is different for each player and never changes for that player.

Returns:

getPlayerToken

java.lang.String getPlayerToken()
Token identifier (eg "X","O") for the player in the current game. This is set by the model and may change as the player plays different games.

Returns:

setPlayerToken

void setPlayerToken(java.lang.String c)
Used to update the player token

Parameters:
c -
